channel.title: Question about making money
channel.description: I'm making a server, but I'm not sure how to base my economy, Like basically it's a 317, I had an idea, mine pure essence and then sell it to the shop for 150-200k an essence, but I don't know, I don't want my players to get bored, then again I'm not an experienced coder, so bossing and things are kind of a misout for me.

item.dc:creator: @Mr.czar Mr.czar
item.description:
@Mr.czar wrote:

So what exactly do you want help with, you want to know what a good eco is or?

Read full topic
